|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Models=== *[https://mightygadget.co.uk/ubiquiti-unifi-u6-enterprise-vs-u6-pro-vs-u6-lr-vs-u6-lite/ Comparison models] 
Ubiquiti AP	UniFi U6 Enterprise	UniFi U6 Pro		UniFi 6 Lite	UniFi 6 Long-Range
Processor	Qualcomm Dual-Core	Qualcomm Dual-Core	MediaTek 880MHz	MediaTek Dual-Core ARM
CPU		ARM (Cortex-A53)	ARM (Cortex-A53)	MIPS 1004Kec	(Cortex-A53) @1.35GHz
RAM			--		512MB			256MB		512MB
MIMO	2.4GHz (2x2 MU-MIMO/OFDMA)	2.4GHz 2x2 (UL MU-MIMO) 2x2		4x4
	5/6GHz (4x4 MU-MIMO/OFDMA) 	5GHz 4x4 (DL/UL MU-MIMO)
Channel Width		20/40/80/160	20/40/80/160		20/40/80	20/40/80/160
Wi-Fi 4 Data Rate	570Mbps		574Mbps			300Mbps		600Mbps
Wi-Fi 5 Data Rate	1.7Gbps		1.7Gbps			867Mbps		1.7Gbps
Wi-Fi 6/6E Data Rate	4.8Gbps  	4.8Gbps			1.2Gbps		2.4Gbps
Ethernet		2.5GbE (RJ45)	Gigabit			Gigabit		Gigabit
==See also== :;[[Ubiquiti Networks#FCC ID]] *SWX-U6EP (2021-08-05) Digital Transmission Radio *SWX-U6MESHR (2021-06-18) Digital Transmission Radio *SWX-U6PROR (2021-05-11) Digital Transmission Radio * *SWX-U6LRR (2021-03-26) Digital Transmission Radio *SWX-U6PRO (2020-11-11) Digital Transmission Radio *SWX-U6LITE (2020-08-21) UniFi U6 Lite *SWX-U6EXT (2020-07-30) Digital Transmission Radio *SWX-U6MESH (2020-06-23) Digital Transmission Radio *SWX-U6LR (2020-05-20) Digital Transmission Radio *SWX-U6IW (2020-05-18) Digital Transmission Radio [[Category:English Documentation]]
